snippet.title: Gloria Victis MMORPG - Official Gameplay Showcase
snippet.description:
Join the battle – get Gloria Victis now!

http://store.steampowered.com/app/327070
http://www.gloriavictisgame.com

Gloria Victis is an innovative MMORPG set in beautiful medieval world. Join the conflict and:

– Earn fame in massive Open PVP battles!
– Enjoy Non-Target Combat with actual medieval arsenal!
– Shape your destiny and become a crafter, trader, warrior – whoever you want!
– Loot defeated enemies and fortify allied castles!
– Contribute to your nation in PVE activities: quests, dynamic events and world events!
– Help the common people through quests and dynamic world events!
– Explore breathtaking Medieval Open World!

#gloriavictis #blackeyegames #mmorpg #medieval 

Music by Marcin Przybyłowicz,
Studio: Black Eye Games

 Gloria Victis is a MMORPG with an emphasis on realism, set in a low-fantasy medieval open world. Enjoy MMO with skill-based non-target combat, open PVP with territory control, deep crafting system and player-driven economy – all that served with beautiful graphics and immersive atmosphere.
